name: ROCKER
description:
WHAT'S THIS GAME?

We made this game for FRIENDS to give them the ability to play TOGETHER .. it's really awesome to play with your friend on the same platform! .. you can't play ROCKER alone .. go now and call your (friend - brother - parent) and play with them! .. hope you ENJOY our small indie game.

:
